mapper.select: select component_output_stub.id as id, component_output_stub.fk_component_info_id as fkComponentInfoId , component_output_stub.fk_running_id as fkRunningId, component_output_stub.output_file_type as outputFileType, component_output_stub.output_table_name as outputTableName, component_output_stub.output_file_addr as outputFileAddr from component_output_stub where component_output_stub.fk_running_id = #{runningId} order by id desc
mapper.update: update component_output_stub set fk_component_info_id = #{fkComponentInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fk_running_id = #{fkRunningId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, output_file_type = #{outputFileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, output_table_name = #{outputTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, output_file_addr = #{outputFileAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, fk_component_info_id, fk_running_id, output_file_type, output_table_name, output_file_addr from component_output_stub where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
